title: Georgian College: Accelerate your success
text: Georgian College [vc_row type=”full-width-background” css=”.vc_custom_1644255034279{padding-top: 10px !important;background-color: #f4f4f4 !important;}”][vc_column][vc_column_text]COVID-19 update: Georgian has suspended masking on campus unless required by lab-specific PPE protocols. Review fall 2022 program delivery information and find out what to expect on campus. International students should review frequently asked questions specific to their arrival.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”full-width-background” css=”.vc_custom_1634050428121{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 30px !important;padding-bottom: 30px !important;background-image: url(https://www.georgiancollege.ca/wp-content/uploads/WEB-21-597-Web-Header-HomePage.jpg?id=183487) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” el_class=”homepage-banner”][vc_column][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][vc_column_text] Experience [/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner el_class=”mt-4 mt-lg-5″][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″] Full-time programs [/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″] Continuing Education [/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″] International students [/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″] Future students [/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner disable_element=”yes” el_class=”mt-4 mt-lg-5″][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”full-width-background” css=”.vc_custom_1529676002430{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 30px !important;}” el_class=”career-match”][vc_column][vc_empty_space height=”20px”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”full-width-background” css=”.vc_custom_1613565122218{margin-bottom: 25px !important;}”][vc_column offset=”vc_col-lg-4 vc_col-md-4″ el_class=”wpb_column”][vc_single_image image=”210632″ onclick=”custom_link” link=”https://www.georgiancollege.ca/news-events/all-events/open-house/”][vc_column_text] Visit us at Open House Experience Georgian in person on Saturday, Nov. 12 at all campuses. Meet faculty, take a campus tour, and explore student services and supports. Win up to $5k towards tuition and apply for free![/vc_column_text] Learn more and RSVP[/vc_column][vc_column offset=”vc_col-lg-4 vc_col-md-4″ el_class=”wpb_column”][vc_single_image image=”212495″ onclick=”custom_link” link=”https://www.georgiancollege.ca/student-life/graduation/”][vc_column_text] Congratulations, graduates! On Oct. 25, we celebrate the achievements and success of our newest graduates. For those who can’t attend the ceremony in person, watch your loved ones cross the stage via our livestream.[/vc_column_text] Learn more about convocation[/vc_column][vc_column offset=”vc_col-lg-4 vc_col-md-4″ el_class=”wpb_column”][vc_single_image image=”164210″ img_size=”full” onclick=”custom_link” link=”https://www.georgiancollege.ca/careermatch/”][vc_column_text] Which career is right for you? Not sure about your next career move? Our career assessment tool will help find the best fit for your personality type and you’ll receive a list of Georgian programs you may be well suited to.[/vc_column_text] Find your program fit [/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row disable_element=”yes” type=”full-width-background” css=”.vc_custom_1648735836392{margin-bottom: 25px !important;}”][vc_column offset=”vc_col-lg-4 vc_col-md-4″ el_class=”wpb_column”][vc_single_image image=”210633″ onclick=”custom_link” link=”https://www.georgiancollege.ca/future-students/”][vc_column_text] Your future starts here Are you ready to pursue your dream career? At Georgian, we have more of what you need to succeed. Learn more about the Georgian experience and your journey to becoming a student here. [/vc_column_text] Start your future at Georgian[vc_single_image image=”152070″ onclick=”custom_link” link=”https://www.georgiancollege.ca/new-students/”][vc_column_text] First-year experience Take part in Orientation, learn how to register for courses, get your student card, apply for financial aid and more! This guide is your one-stop shop as a new student.[/vc_column_text] Read the Guide for New Students [vc_single_image image=”206278″ onclick=”custom_link” link=”https://www.georgiancollege.ca/about-georgian/visit-us/campus-tours/”][vc_column_text] Take a campus tour The best way to imagine yourself at Georgian is to visit us in person, on campus. Experience a guided tour of our campuses to see why you should be here now. We look forward to seeing you soon![/vc_column_text] Book your campus visit [/vc_column][vc_column offset=”vc_col-lg-4 vc_col-md-4″ el_class=”wpb_column”][vc_single_image image=”212588″ onclick=”custom_link” link=”https://www.georgiancollege.ca/academics/new-programs/”][vc_column_text] Discover our 15 new programs We’ve launched 15 new programs—a mix of certificates, diplomas, graduate certificates and degrees—that will help get you job-ready for today’s workforce, and meet the demands of local employers. [/vc_column_text] Explore Georgian's new programs[vc_single_image image=”161276″ onclick=”custom_link” link=”https://www.georgiancollege.ca/academics/programs/”][vc_column_text] Apply to Georgian today Are you ready to pursue your dream career? It’s not too late to apply for programs starting this September. Explore our 130+ full-time programs and apply today! [/vc_column_text] Search our programs[vc_single_image image=”141842″ onclick=”custom_link” link=”https://www.georgiancollege.ca/coronavirus/?refresh=hp”][vc_column_text] Coronavirus (COVID-19) updates Stay updated with the latest COVID-19 information for the Georgian community. Use our summer 2022 program search tool to find out how your program will be delivered.[/vc_column_text] Coronavirus information [/vc_column][vc_column offset=”vc_col-lg-4 vc_col-md-4″ el_class=”wpb_column”][vc_single_image image=”183136″ onclick=”custom_link” link=”https://www.georgiancollege.ca/news-events/all-events/get-to-know-georgian/”][vc_column_text] Get to Know Georgian Thinking about studying at Georgian? Have questions about our programs or services? We’re here to help! Attend a Get to Know Georgian virtual information session on Tuesday, Aug. 9 from 5 to 6 p.m.[/vc_column_text] Learn more and RSVP[vc_single_image image=”206868″ onclick=”custom_link” link=”https://www.georgiancollege.ca/academics/continuing-education/courses/”][vc_column_text] Continuing Education starts here Registration is open for part-time program courses and individual Continuing Education courses running this fall! Enhance your career on your own terms, with flexible courses that fit your schedule.[/vc_column_text] Explore our courses[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”full-width-background” css=”.vc_custom_1629218475386{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 30px !important;padding-top: 45px !important;padding-bottom: 30px !important;background: #00254a url(https://www.georgiancollege.ca/wp-content/uploads/Home_Bkgd_Audience_Banner_home-page_2560by450.jpg?id=127725) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” el_class=”homepage-banner two”][vc_column][vc_row_inner css=”.vc_custom_1629137795809{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_inner][vc_column_text] Your guide to Georgian College Find information for: [/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner el_class=”mt-4″ css=”.vc_custom_1629137734616{margin-top: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_inner el_class=”closeulgap” width=”1/4″][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1629221032077{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”] [/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner el_class=”closeulgap” width=”1/4″][vc_column_text] [/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”full-width-background” el_class=”stats”][vc_column][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][vc_column_text] Why Georgian College? [/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][vc_column_text] 85.8% of our graduates find employment within six months of graduation[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][vc_column_text] 6,200 employers partner with Georgian to offer student work experiences[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][vc_column_text] 100% of our programs emphasize practical, hands-on learning[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][vc_column_text] 1st Georgian is the first and only college in Canada designated as an Ashoka Changemaker College[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”full-width-background” css=”.vc_custom_1557948562850{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 30px !important;padding-top: 30px !important;padding-bottom: 30px !important;background-image: url(https://www.georgiancollege.ca/wp-content/uploads/Home_Bkgd_WhatsHappening_Banner_home-page_2560by450.jpg?id=128190) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” el_class=”homepage-banner three”][vc_column][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][vc_column_text] What’s happening @GeorgianCollege [/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner css=”.vc_custom_1557416053579{margin-top: 30px !important;}” el_class=”mt-4 mt-lg-5″][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″] View all news [/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″] View all events [/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”full-width-background” el_id=”news-events”][vc_column offset=”vc_col-lg-6 vc_col-md-6″]
